name: Dot Man
overview: Dot Man is a single-player Pac-Man clone for the VIC-20. The player controls Dot Man, as he moves about a maze eating dots. Four ghosts move randomly about, and will cost the player a life if they youch Dot Man. Four poiwer pills in the corners of the map make ghosts temporarily vulnerable. After eating all the dots, the player moves to a level with faster moving ghosts. The player starts with 3 lives.
